title: Speechless
description: !!!!!!!WARNING 18+ Only!!!!!EXTREMELY EXPLICIT LITERARY EROTICADO NOT READ IF YOU CAN NOT STRONG WOMENINTERRACIAL RELATIONSHIPSORAL SEXGRAPHICALLY DESCRIBED INTERCOURSEPENETRATIONGRAPHIC DETAILSWELL-WRITTEN SMUT WITH AN INTERESTING PLOTLINE.....but mostly SMUT!SURPRIZE ENDING!Norman is a successful, yet awkward professional who is left by his horrible wife. While in the pit of despair, he comes into having a relationship with the girl of his dreams who just happens to be a Victoria Secret model...is it too good to be true? Janet is always ready for him, all the time. Norman is thrilled and satisfied with all Janet does for him, until a voluptuous ebony goddess interviews him for the position of Chief Financial Officer at a prosthetics manufacturing plant. To make matters more interesting, he might be falling for the secretary that his ebony mistress assigns to him! Then, can you believe, his horrible ex, Stephanie, wants to get back together! Will Norman muster some courage and tell his ex off -something he's always wanted to do? Will he stay with his dream-girl, Janet. Perhaps, Shamika will get Norman under one of her hot, red stiletto heels before that even happens...that scene will be in my next novella - So stay tuned! Follow my author page!Jane Ecstacy Doe
author: J.E. Doe
